message: So we thought we'd make our own news source, that's just great apps and nothing else
And we only tweet something if we use and love it ourselves, so you wont be subjected to any of the latest hyped apps that aren't actually that good
The very best consumer technology.  No discussion of funding, politics, or anything other than the product itself.  http://twitter.com/#!/appsonly
We've been frustrated by the stuff that mixes with announcements of new products on TechCrunch - funding stuff, politics stuff, you know
I just joined the group and following @appsonly. I'm looking forward to the tweets.
@kittycatman2 Good to have you.  What kind of apps are you most interested in?
Can you please change the @appsonly profile picture? I won't bare seeing that in my timeline.
I agree.  Here's a new icon, feel free to use it... https://img.skitch.com/20110531-jbbrhp8mr9b2ggpth4htbpkarx.png
Sweet Tweet :) I love usefull stuff in my timeline
@Shorty Thanks!  Tell us if you have any tips!
